snippet.title: Ravaged Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Our online multiplayer first-person shooter Ravaged is now available for PC gamers worldwide on Steam, Origin, 2dawn.com, and other digital retailers.  A free playable demo is also available on Steam that is compatible with the retail version, allowing demo players and retail players to play in the same matches.  Please visit our site for more info: www.2dawn.com

"The Multiplayer RAGE Never Had."
-- Kotaku

"A rocking multiplayer-only, vehicle-heavy twist on the post-apocalyptic FPS."
-- GameSpy

"Combines the brashness and twitch action of Unreal Tournament with the vehicular system and color palette of Borderlands."
-- GameRevolution

"Vehicles are the real stars in the chaotic world of team-shooter Ravaged."
-- VentureBeat

"With the level of experience on board the 2Dawn Games team, it is no surprise Ravaged has gotten high praise and looks to be shaping up to take the PC FPS scene by force."
-- Indie Game Mag
